question: Ahari hejuru cyane y'ubuso bumurika h'amatara ndangambere na ndanganyuma ntihashobora kuba aharenze ibipimo bikurikira hejuru y'ubutaka iyo ikinyabiziga kidapakiye:
Igihe utwaye umuntu mu kinyabiziga cyawe, akibagirwa kwambara umukandara  wo kwirinda ibyago  ugomba:
answers: a) gukuramo  umukandara  wo kwirinda ibyago wambaye mukawambara mwembi
b) kubyerengagiza wizeyeko  nta mpanuka muri bukore
c) funga cyane umukandara wo kwirinda ibyago wawe
d) Kubibutsa kwambara umukandara wo kwirinda ibyago

question: Ubugari bw'imizigo yikorewe n'ipikipiki idafite akanyabiziga ko kuruhande kimwe n'ubwa romoruki ikuruwe na bene icyo kinyabiziga ntibushobora kurenza ibipimo bikurikira:
Amatara maremare y'ikinyabiziga agomba kutamurika mu bihe bikurikira:
answers: a) iyo umuhanda umurikiwe umuyobozi abasha kureba muri m 200
b) iyo ikinyabiziga kigiye kubisikana nikindi

question: Uburyo bukoreshwa kugirango ikinyabiziga kigende gahoro igihe feri idakora neza bwitwa:
Umurongo mugari wera udacagaguye ushobora gucibwa ku muhanda kugirango ugaragaze ibi bikurikira:
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki?
Ugeze ahari inzira yabanyamaguru barindiriye kwambuka. Ntibatangiye kwambuka , wakora iki?
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki?
answers: a) Ahegereye amasangano y'inzira nyabagendwa n'inzira ya gari ya moshi ibambiye

question: Ibinyabiziga bikurikira bigomba kugira icyerekana umuvuduko kiri aho umuyobozi areba neza kandi kigahora kitabwaho kugirango kigume gukora neza:
answers: a) ibinyabiziga bifite umuvuduko nibura wa km 60 mu isaha
b) ibinyabiziga bishobora kurenza km 40 mu isaha
c) ibinyabiziga bishobora kurenza km 30 mu isaha
d) ibinyabiziga bishobora kurenza km 25 mu isaha

question: Ni ryari ikinyabiziga gishobora kugenda mu muhanda moteri itaka cyangwa vitesi idakora:
Ibinyabiziga bikurikira bigomba kugira itara ry'ubururu rimyatsa riboneka mu mpande zose:
answers: a) ibinyabiziga bifite ubugari burenga m 2 na cm 10

question: Igihe za otobisi zigenewe gutwara  banyeshuli zihagaze kugirango zibafate cyangwa bavemo  ugomba :
answers: b) gukomeza ugabanyije umuvuduko n'ubwitonzi  kuko bishoboka ko abanyeshuli bakwambuka bitunguranye

question: Birabujijwe guhagarara akanya kanini aha hakurikira:
answers: c) A na B ni ibisubizo by'ukuri

question: Buri modoka cyangwa buri romoruki ikuruwe n'iyo modoka bishobora kugira itara risa n'icyatsi kibisi bituma umuyobozi yerekana ko yabonye ikimenyetso cy'uwitegura kumunyuraho. Iryo tara rigomba gushyirwa aha hakurikira:
answers: b) inyuma hafi y'impera y'iburyo bw'ikinyabiziga

question: Ubugari bwa romoruki ikuruwe n'igare cyangwa velomoteri ntiburenza ibipimo bikurikira:
Umuyobozi w'ikinyabizaga ashobora kunyuranaho:
answers: c) igihe umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga kiri imbere ye amweretse ikimenyetso kimwemerera kunyuranaho

question: Igihe imodoka iparitse ku nkengero z'umuhanda  mugihe cy' ijoro:
answers: b) Umuntu ufite uruhushya rwo gutwara ikinyabiziga agomba kuba yicaye mu mwanya w'umuyobozi
c) Amatara yo guhagarara  umwanya munini aguma yaka

question: Icyapa gitanga uburenganzira bwo gutambuka mbere kigira iyihe shusho?
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki?
answers: a) Uguhinguka ku mwaro cyangwa ku nkombe cyangwa ahegereye icyome
b) Inzira nyabagendwa iri kumusozi ucuramye
